description: The file is an HTML page that serves as a user interface for a database visualization tool. It includes styling and JavaScript code to list databases, tables, and show data dynamically, indicating it functions as a core part of a web-based front-end application.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets UI states, and initiates data reload.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses database entries to show or hide their tables, triggering table data load.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays table names for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it in a table format.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for a data table from data array.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML, handling objects, nulls, and long strings appropriately.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles expansion of cell content for longer or object data types.
